subject: Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Ben Rubeor scored on a left-handed bounce shot with 31 seconds left in overtime to give the No. 2-seeded Cavaliers an 8-7 victory over No. 7 Maryland.
snippet: Ben Rubeor scored on a left-handed bounce shot with 31 seconds left in overtime to give the No. 2-seeded Cavaliers an 8-7 victory over No. 7 Maryland.
